page.title: 17Games children play in Otley
page.content: All children like to play games in their spare time. These are some of the games that children play in the street,Tig,British Bulldogs and Relevo. Many people make up their own games, these are some of the games that my friends and I have made up_Jaws and Zocher. JAWS:_It is played in the swimming baths.Jaws carries an arm band or a ball and tries to hit an other person with it. ZOCHER:_Its rules are exactly the same as in football but it is played with a stone in the SNOW. Box games are popular as well here are a few of them,Battleships,Scrabble Monopoly,Downfall and Cluedo. You can get great enjoyment out of these games if you play them properly.
